SpeedDifferenceFromTarget: Measures how close the ego vehicle speeds are to the target velocity. The more negative the value, the greater the deviation from the target velocity.
SpeedDifferenceWithLeader: Measures the speed difference between ego vehicles and their leaders. The more negative the value, the greater the speed difference with the leader.
HeadwayToLeader: Measures the headway distance between ego vehicles and their leaders. The more positive the value, the greater the headway distance maintained.
SpeedDifferenceWithFollower: Measures the speed difference between ego vehicles and their followers. The more negative the value, the greater the speed difference with the follower.
ContinuousCollisionPenalty: Applies a penalty based on the occurrence of a collision and the accelerations involved. The more negative the value, the more severe the conditions leading to a collision.
